access_barriers.label: Access barriers
access_barriers.description: Toys stored too high, containers too heavy to open

space_barriers.label: Space barriers
space_barriers.description: Not enough room to move, shared space conflicts

sensory_barriers.label: Sensory barriers
sensory_barriers.description: Overwhelmed by noise, avoids messy textures

social_barriers.label: Social barriers
social_barriers.description: Difficulty sharing, needs adult help to start play
